metadata.description: Rules for eliminating irrelevant HS codes based on user input. Used by elimination.service.ts

arabica.description: When user says Arabica, exclude other coffee varieties

robusta.description: When user says Robusta, exclude other coffee varieties

liberica.description: When user says Liberica, exclude other coffee varieties

black tea.description: When user says black tea, exclude other tea types

green tea.description: When user says green tea, exclude other tea types

white tea.description: When user says white tea, exclude other tea types

oolong.description: When user says oolong, exclude other tea types

basmati.description: When user says basmati, exclude other rice varieties

jasmine.description: When user says jasmine, exclude other rice varieties

black pepper.description: When user says black pepper, exclude other pepper types

white pepper.description: When user says white pepper, exclude other pepper types

instant.description: Instant coffee must be in Ch.21, exclude raw/roasted coffee codes

soluble.description: Soluble coffee must be in Ch.21, exclude raw/roasted coffee codes

extract.description: Coffee extract must be in Ch.21, exclude raw/roasted coffee codes

roasted.description: Roasted coffee must be in Ch.09, exclude processed forms

raw.description: Raw coffee must be in Ch.09, exclude processed forms

green.description: Green (unroasted) coffee must be in Ch.09, exclude processed forms

unroasted.description: Unroasted coffee must be in Ch.09, exclude processed forms

instant.description: Instant tea must be in Ch.21

leaves.description: Tea leaves must be in Ch.09

grade a.description: When user specifies Grade A, exclude other grades

grade b.description: When user specifies Grade B, exclude other grades

grade c.description: When user specifies Grade C, exclude other grades

plantation.description: When user specifies plantation grade, exclude other grades

for vehicles.description: Parts for vehicles go to Ch.87, not material chapters

for cars.description: Parts for cars go to Ch.87, not material chapters

for trucks.description: Parts for trucks go to Ch.87, not material chapters

automotive.description: Automotive parts go to Ch.87, not material chapters

brake pads.description: Brake pads are vehicle parts (Ch.87) regardless of material (ceramic, metal)

brake disc.description: Brake discs are vehicle parts (Ch.87) regardless of material

ground.description: Ground form excludes whole beans and instant

decaffeinated.description: When user specifies decaffeinated, exclude caffeinated codes

not decaffeinated.description: When user specifies caffeinated, exclude decaf codes

flavored.description: When user specifies flavored, exclude unflavored codes

unflavored.description: When user specifies unflavored, exclude flavored codes
